mapper.select: SELECT SYOUHIN.SHOUHINNO AS SHOUHIN_SHOUHINNO1 ,SYOUHIN.SHOUHINMEISHOU AS SHOUHIN_SHOUHINMEISHOU2 ,SYOUHIN.ZAISHITSU AS SHOUHIN_ZAISHITSU3 ,SYOUHIN.NYUUKAHIDZUKE AS SHOUHIN_NYUUKAHIDZUKE4 ,SYOUHIN.PRICE AS SHOUHIN_TANKA5 ,SYOUHIN.ZAIKOSUURYOU AS SHOUHIN_ZAIKOSUURYOU6 ,KAISYA.KAISHAMEI AS KAISHA_KAISHAMEI7 FROM SYOUHIN LEFT JOIN KAISYA ON KAISYA.KAISHAID = SYOUHIN.TSUKAMATSUNYUUSAKI WHERE 1 = 1 AND CASE WHEN #{SHOUHINMEI} IS NULL OR #{SHOUHINMEI} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE SYOUHIN.SHOUHINMEISHOU = #{SHOUHINMEI} END AND CASE WHEN #{KAISHAMEI} IS NULL OR #{KAISHAMEI} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE SYOUHIN.TSUKAMATSUNYUUSAKI = #{KAISHAMEI} END
